step1.para: Chock wheels.
Disconnect IAT sensor.
Remove complete air filter assembly to include turbocharger compressor inlet duct (air filter to turbocharger hose) and breather elbow hose.
Remove charge air cooler pipes/hoses.
Remove charge air cooling tube (crossover y-pipe) from turbocharger and air intake covers. Cap open ports.
Disconnect exhaust outlet pipe from turbocharger.
Disconnect exhaust pipes from both exhaust manifolds. Disconnect exhaust turbocharger inlet adapter from turbocharger.
Remove turbocharger mounting bolts. Cover oil ports.

note.para: Two bolts are located in valley area and two bolts are located at the back of the turbocharger pedestal assembly.

step1.para: Remove turbocharger with pedestal attached.
Remove turbocharger pedestal from turbocharger.

note.para: Bolts are located at bottom of pedestal assembly.

step1.para: Replace all gaskets and O-rings.
Clean mating surfaces.
Install new O-rings lubricated with clean engine oil to turbocharger. Apply "Never Seez" to pedestal mounting bolts. Install pedestal to turbocharger.
Install new O-rings lubricated with clean engine oil into oil supply and oil drain ports located at pedestal mounting pad of crankcase.
Install turbocharger assembly to mounting pad of crankcase. Torque bolts to spec.
Connect exhaust turbocharger inlet adapter with new gasket to turbocharger. Torque to spec.
Apply "Never Seez" to bolts retaining exhaust pipes to exhaust manifolds. Connect exhaust pipes to exhaust manifolds. Torque to spec.
Connect exhaust outlet pipe to turbocharger.
Install new O-ring lubricated with clean engine oil to turbocharger compressor discharge air outlet. Install charge air cooling tube to turbocharger and air intake covers.
Install charge air cooler pipes/hoses.
Install air filter assembly, include turbocharger compressor inlet duct and breather elbow hose.
Connect IAT sensor.
Start engine. Check for leaks.
Remove wheel chocks.
